title: new account
body: i leveled up my new acount and i only got 1 exlusive hextech chest are'nt these supose to be 2?

replies.body: You should get a premium chest and another containing Ashe and Garen.  Give it about 24 hours after reaching level 5, not 2.  If you run into any issues after reaching 5, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
no i was level 5 but got 1 chest instead of 2 but now i already got the 2nd one after loging out and in again
